category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Item.Item.CopyAssemblyInContext
preference.preference_description: Lists the cloning rules to be used for cloning an assembly where the type of source item is Item and target item type is Item. The syntax allows for different rules for different combinations of item types. Typically, in this case, the children are cloned. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid Teamcenter cloning rule.
